scenes.name: intro
scenes.text:
You wake up.
 In the middle of a desert.
 There is a bag next to you.

scenes.name: second
scenes.text: Desert. [if(inv.bag == 0)]There is a bag next to you.[/if] [if (inv.lookaround == 1)]There is nothing around. Only sand. A lots of it.[/if]

scenes.name: bag
scenes.text: You search the bag. There is a water bottle.

scenes.name: walk0
scenes.text: You walk for a while. It is very hot.

scenes.name: walk2
scenes.text: It is very hot. [if(inv.not_thirsty == 1)]You are getting thirsty.[/if]

scenes.name: walk3
scenes.text: You see light flicker in a distance.

scenes.name: flicker
scenes.text: [if(inv.bottle_leaver == 1)]As you get closer to the place you saw the flickering from you meet a small child. He doesn't talk. Neither do you. He joins you on your journey.[/if][if(inv.not_thirsty != 1)]You are thirsty.[/if] There is still a long way ahead of you.

scenes.name: airplane
scenes.text: You found what seems to be like a crashed airplane. What a strange thing to find in a desert! you think for yourself. You get closer to the plane. It looks habitated. There is old woman sitting under the cloth hiding from the sun. She doesn't talk. Neither do you. She just hands you a book, old book. You open it and see there is a circled word. "Thirsty" says the word. You understand. [if(inv.water_bottle == 0)]But you are out of water.[/if]

scenes.name: deadly_thirst
scenes.text: The thirst really strikes you now. You fall on your knees.[if(inv.bottle_leaver == 1)] The small child looks at you. He says nothing. After a while of staring at you he hands you a bottle of water.[/if]

scenes.name: well
scenes.text: [if(inv.bottle_leaver == 1)]The childs water has saved your life.[/if] You got to a place looking like an abandoned village. You [if(inv.bottle_leaver == 1)]and the child [/if]decide to explore. There are few half-destroyed shelters. And a well! You get closer hoping to find some water.

scenes.name: wandering
scenes.text: You are wandering through the desert. Without any food[if(inv.water_bottle == 0)], without any water[/if]. You don't know where you are going. It has been hours since you met the old lady. [if(inv.water_bottle > 0)]You wish you'd given her some water.[/if] You have lost your way, you are wandering until your last breath.
